system.description:
Effect: All valid targets have a 50% chance to gain Poison 5. and a 50% chance to gain Paralysis 5.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Toxtricity and has an Electric-Type attack on their Active List.
